2024 Candidate Election Packet Information

Thank you for seeking to serve your city. The below documents are to aid in your preparation for filing for office.

Candidate Packets are available at City Hall if you prefer hard copies.

  • 2024 Election Calendar
  • Application For A Place on the Ballot
  • Guide to Campaign Finance
  • 2024 Filing Schedule
  • Appointing a Campaign Treasurer (Instructions)
  • Campaign Finance Reports (Instructions)
  • Fair Campaign Practices (Fair Campaign Practices Act)
  • Political Advertising (Prohibition of Using Political Subdivision Resources for Political Advertising)
  • Campaign Signs

Past Election Results2021 Order Canvassing Returns

  • Additional election and voting information can be found on the following websites:

    • Wharton County Election's Office
    • VoteTexas.gov
    • Voters with Disabilities
